item.title: Install Prometheus for Gitlab
item.description: Prometheus is an open-source monitoring system with a built-in noSQL time-series database. It offers a multi-dimensional data model, a flexible query language, and diverse visualization possibilities. Prometheus collects metrics from http nedpoint. Most service dindâ€™t have this endpoint so you need optional programs that generate additional metrics cald exporters.
